Demanded

We are one of the busiest company in the industry; since our foundation we had at least one active project at any given time, and we have erected more Gas Turbines, Steam Turbines, and HRSGs than any other company in Turkey.

Who We Are?

Mastır Enerji is specialized in Power Plant equipment manufacturing and erection, and construction works. The company was established in 2001 by a team of engineers and technicians with over 30 years of experience, and since then completed numerous projects for the biggest power plants in Turkey. To date we have erected numerious HRSGs, Gas Turbines, and Steam Turbines with outputs ranging up to 65MW.

HRSG

More than 35 units of various types of Heat Recovery Steam Generators (HRSG).

View details »

Gas Turbines

More than 25 units of Gas Turbines from various makers.

View details »

Steam Turbines

More than 25 units of Steam Turbines from various makers.

View details »

Balance of Plant

Thousands of kilometers length of piping with thousands of tons steel installation, along with auxilliary equipment.

View details »

Ongoing / Recent Projects

Tupras / Kırıkkale.

Electromechanical Installation works of one Aalborg SteamGen™ 4 Package boiler and one SteamGen™ 6 HRSG with supplementary and fresh air firing for the Kirikkale Refinery 80 km outside Ankara, Turkey..

Kayalı Enerji / Osmaniye

  • Mechanical Installation of Nooter/Eriksen HRSG with Bypass Stack
  • Mechanical Installation of 60 MW Siemens Trent Gas Turbine
  • Mechanical Installation of 15.7 MW Siemens Steam Turbine
  • Installation of BoP piping (incl. auxilliary equipment

Modern Karton / Çorlu.

"1 X 240 TPH, Single Drum, Water Tube CFCB Boiler Project Equipment Installation".
